sections.heading: Overview
content:
For the last 12 years John S. James has published AIDS Treatment News , an influential,
award-winning newsletter on experimental, approved, and complementary
treatments for HIV. The newsletter also covers public-policy issues in
treatment research and development, and provides access to worldwide
information on new drugs and other appropriate care. AIDS Treatment News is
supported by subscriptions and does not accept grants or contributions from
pharmaceutical companies.
James is a cum laude graduate of Harvard College.
